title: Smart Data Models - ReportingGroup
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A reporting group is used for various ad-hoc groupings used for reporting.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ReportingGroup

BusNameMarker.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The reporting group to which this bus name marker belongs. Default: 'list'

TopologicalNode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The reporting group to which the topological node belongs. Default: 'list'
